CustomField.formula: IF( LEN( text(Dialpad__Time_in_Hours_rpt__c) ) = 1, '0' + text(Dialpad__Time_in_Hours_rpt__c) + ':00 - 0' + text(Dialpad__Time_in_Hours_rpt__c) + ':59', text(Dialpad__Time_in_Hours_rpt__c) + ':00 - ' + text(Dialpad__Time_in_Hours_rpt__c) + ':59' )
CustomField.label: Hourly Breakup
